Tesla Model 3

Tesla Model 3 is a sleek, all-electric sedan designed for efficiency, performance, and advanced technology. It seats up to five passengers and features a minimalist interior highlighted by a large touchscreen display for navigation, media, and vehicle controls. The Model 3 offers rear-wheel drive (RWD) and dual motor all-wheel drive (AWD) configurations, with quick acceleration and a quiet, comfortable ride.
